short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An assistant to extract worker and daily program information for a logged in user from ergani

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ergani Data Extractor is used by subscribed users in ergani.emblem.gr for easier download of required excel files from eservices.yeka.gr. It makes it easier for users to download the excel files of their workers and their weekly program instead of manually visiting another website and downloading the excel file.
